name: only the digital gods: VIRTUAL TEAHOUSE
name_original: only the digital gods: VIRTUAL TEAHOUSE
description:
You are a simple software merchant, out to find truths.  
Will you find them? 

At least you will learn about the patrons of the teahouse, and perhaps meddle in their affairs.

Based on 2018's  tabletop rpg of the year:  ONLY THE GODS,
set in a  cyberpunk world, and after the events of MEAT MARKET. 

(though no prior knowledge is expected or needed)

flicksy file and assets available, as always.
